content.title: Upcoming Webinars
description: ​Supreme Court 2022-23 Term in Review

As another exciting U.S. Supreme Court Terms nears its conclusion, Justia Webinars proudly announces our 2022-2023 Supreme Court term in review. Join Illinois Law Dean and Professor Vikram Amar and Cornell Law School Professor Michael Dorf as they discuss some of the leading cases and issues decided in this SCOTUS term, as well as those issues the court failed to address.

content.title: Recent Recordings
description: ​Requests and Forms as Modern as the Evidence You Seek

Are your discovery requests still mired in a bygone world of telegrams and carbon paper? Are you getting pummeled with expenses and review challenges you need not accept? In this on-demand webinar, e-discovery expert Craig Ball discusses ways to revamp your requests to target electronic evidence and protect your bottom line in the modern world.
The Ethics of Online Advertising and Marketing
Stream this on-demand webinar in which Justia CEO Tim Stanley shares information to help demystify the ethical implications surrounding digital/online advertising for lawyers and law firms!
